name: Wolf in Shepherd's Clothing
description:
Fredrik the Farmer has woken up with a nasty surprise... He's been bitten by a werewolf! Luckily, the culprit left him a sticky note with instructions to break the curse. Using Fredrik's farming and crafting skills, craft the items necessary to perform the ancient ritual to break Fredrik's curse and free him from his beastly form. But be careful! At night, Fredrik assumes the form of a terrible wolf and loses all control of his actions! He might just slaughter the animals you were raising, raid your storage, or trample your garden!

Lupus Agriculturus is a strategy card game that involves farming and crafting. You can craft ingredients which go towards breaking the curse as well as temporary items that protect the farm.

Code by Kate Briggs and Vincent Miller

3D Art by Vincent Miller

2D Art from a Humble pack by Rexxard
